ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Interesting thought...
ygData.msgSnippet: ...and what about 4 new servers?  They really need 12 if they re going to make a difference. ... http://click.egroups.com/1/2646/7/_/451022/_/954879919/ ...
ygData.messageBody:
...and what about 4 new servers? They really need 12
if they're going to make a difference.

--- "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
wrote:
> So the first of the Chant series is the lvl 30 song
> right? Not the lvl 1
> song ;-)
>
> I suppose that helps a lot of people out there, but
> those of us who cannot
> cast them yet will just have to wait. At least we
> didn't have to endure
> them not working. Gotta love the answer on looking
> into problems with
> Lullaby, not until after expansion which is more
> important. Must be the
> same answer for our missing spells under 50th level.
> Sigh.
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 04, 2000 2:25 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Interesting thought...
>
>
> On Tue, 4 Apr 2000, Kevin L. Crawford wrote:
> >
> > Now that the Chant series works properly...
> >
> > Has anyone tried medleying just 4 dot's in combat?
> (not
> > that this is optimal but it would be interesting
> to see
> > the result). ;)
>
> Yes, a lot of bards have been discussing it at The
> Concert
> Hall. The damage you can do with the new DoTs is
> enough to
> "steal" kills from other tanks. Seems with this fix
> our
> damage finally matches our position in the grand
> scheme of
> things - in between casters and tanks - instead of
> being the
> class with the lowest damage output in the game.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
>
>
